snippet: Ms. Rich wrote a memoir about the daily trials encountered in a place she called Cancerland, and ended up living there far longer than the year or two she had expected.
abstract: Katherine Russell Rich, whose gritty, darkly comic memoir of her protracted battle with breast cancer became a beacon for other patients, dies at age 56.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Rich wrote a memoir about the daily trials encountered in a place she called Cancerland, and ended up living there far longer than the year or two she had expected.

headline.seo: Katherine Russell Rich, Who Wrote of Cancer Fight, Dies at 56
headline.main: Katherine Russell Rich, Who Wrote of Battle With Cancer, Dies at 56
headline.print_headline: Katherine Russell Rich, 56; Wrote of Battle With Cancer
